dict.string: Split the element in the array into two child arrays
Continue to divide the elements in the array into sub-arrays, until the number of elements in the array is one
Continue to divide the elements in the array into sub-arrays, until the number of elements in the array is one
When the number of elements in the array is one, each element in the array is pushed upward by their value from small to large.
